metadata.synopsis: Astarion's comment after we finish talking to Ketheric and he told us to kneel at the altar.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Have Astarion-Companion in party.Talk to Ketheric.

0.speaker: Astarion
0.text: Finally. Time to see the one controlling these parasites.

1.speaker: Astarion
1.text: Maybe they can be controlled just as easily.
